# ğŸªŸ PortWatch â€“ Windows Portable

This directory contains the **portable Windows distribution** of PortWatch.

It is fully self-contained and **does not require Java to be installed** on the system.

---

## â–¶ï¸ How to run

### Option 1: Double click (recommended)
1. Open this folder
2. Double-click **`run.cmd`**

A console window will open, execute PortWatch, and remain visible.

---

### Option 2: From Command Prompt
1. Open **Command Prompt**
2. Navigate to this directory
3. Run:
   ```cmd
   run.cmd

ğŸ“‚ Output data

All generated data (snapshots and diffs) is stored locally in a data/ folder created next to the executable.

No system-wide changes are made.

â„¹ï¸ Notes

The bundled runtime is specific to Windows.

Administrative privileges are not required.

This distribution is intended for portable and removable-media usage.
